items.sentence: Here\'s a list of things that Tom needs to buy.
How many times do you think you\'ve eaten here?
The truth is that I can\'t speak French at all.
The only language that Tom can speak is French.
The police say they know you had an accomplice.
The police suspect that Tom is a serial killer.
I appreciate the gesture, but it\'s not enough.
My advice is to tell Tom what he wants to know.
My father drinks a cup of coffee every morning.
I\'d like to have a few minutes alone with Tom.
